title: How to Make a Secondary Blog on Tumblr

steps.title: Log into Tumblr.
steps.content: Log into Tumblr. Enter your e-mail address and password as Tumblr asks.

steps.title: Go to the dashboard.
steps.content: Go to the dashboard. You will be automatically redirected to the dashboard after you log in. If you are on another Tumblr page, click the Dashboard button in the upper-right corner.

steps.title: Click the Account button.
steps.content: Click the Account button. This button is located in the upper-right corner, on the left of the blue Make a Post button. After you click the button, a window should drop down.

steps.title: Click the Settings button.
steps.content: Click the Settings button. his button is located under the Following button in the menu that just dropped down.

steps.title: Click Create a new blog, located on the right side of the screen, under the section Blogs.
steps.content: Click Create a new blog , located on the right side of the screen, under the section Blogs .

steps.title: Fill in the necessary information.
steps.content: Fill in the necessary information. Choose a blog name, a URL, a password (optional), and fill in the CAPTCHA.

steps.title: Click Create (private) blog.
steps.content: Click Create (private) blog . If you chose a password, it will display Create private blog , if you didn't, it will display Create blog .

steps.title: Done.
steps.content: Done. You will now be automatically redirected to the dashboard of your secondary blog.
